function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited registered products for sanitizing ductwork, especially for fiber glass duct board or fiber glass lined ducts","Impact":"Reduced ability to effectively sanitize ductwork, leading to potential contamination of HVAC system","Mitigation":"Research alternative sanitization methods or products, or consult with professionals for specialized cleaning","Technologies":"Ultraviolet germicidal irradiation (UVGI), alternative sanitization technologies","People":"Maintenance and cleaning professionals, HVAC system owners","Owner":"Maintenance and cleaning professionals, HVAC system owners"},{"Description":"Risk of dissemination of infectious aerosols in buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases within indoor environments","Mitigation":"Implement ultraviolet germicidal irradiation (UVGI) and other disinfection technologies, follow ASHRAE guidelines for ventilation and filtration","Technologies":"Ultraviolet germicidal irradiation (UVGI), ventilation, filtration","People":"Occupants of buildings, maintenance and cleaning professionals","Owner":"Building owners, maintenance and cleaning professionals"},{"Description":"Airborne transmission of SARS-CoV-2 and other contagious diseases","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne exposure and transmission of contagious diseases within non-health-care buildings","Mitigation":"Implement ventilation and filtration systems as per ASHRAE guidelines, follow recommendations for controlling airborne exposure to viruses","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, filtration systems, ultraviolet germicidal irradiation (UVGI)","People":"Occupants of non-health-care buildings, maintenance and cleaning professionals","Owner":"Building owners, maintenance and cleaning professionals"}]}
